column6: The Exiles are back to finish what they started in their first mission, and its Panther knows how to bring down the mutant alliance! (Hint: involves mutants getting nekkid) Also, Morph returns to prep the team for a new mission to a world where "science" never caught on so much.  Parental Advisory ...$3.99
